product_name: CatEye Adventure Bike Computer - Wireless - 2013 Closeout
long_description: If you have hill climbs on your training route, you want the wireless CatEye Adventure mounted on your handlebars. Great for capturing elevation on rides, it's packed with easy-to-use features.
short_description: If you have hill climbs on your training route, you want the wireless CatEye Adventure mounted on your handlebars. Great for capturing elevation on rides, it's packed with easy-to-use features.
